description: Application to vary condition 8 (provision of 10% energy through renewable technologies) on appeal APP/V5570/A/07/2037098 DATED 20/08/07 planning permission reference P061828, so that condition reads " Before the development hereby permitted is begun, a scheme for incorporating the provision of on-site renewable technologies to the maximum level that is feasible, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  The approved scheme shall be implemented before the development is first occupied and shall thereafter be maintained so that it  provides the required level of generation."
decision_conditions: In submission of the required scheme, the applicant should indicate reductions in baseline consumption through improved u-values, the possibility of communal gas fired boilers in place of individual boilers and use of energy efficient lighting and lighting control. The applicant should also investigate the use of A frames in the proposed solar cells.
